statements: SELECT * FROM machine_learning_dataset;
SELECT column1, column3 FROM machine_learning_dataset WHERE column2 LIKE '%example%';
SELECT column2, column3, column1 FROM machine_learning_dataset WHERE column1 > 10 ORDER BY column2 DESC;
SELECT AVG(column3) AS average_value FROM machine_learning_dataset;
SELECT column1, column2, column3 FROM machine_learning_dataset WHERE column1 = 5 OR column3 < 100 ORDER BY column2 ASC;
SELECT column1, column2, column3 FROM machine_learning_dataset WHERE column1 > 100 ORDER BY column3 DESC;
SELECT column2, column3 FROM machine_learning_dataset WHERE column2 LIKE '%example%' ORDER BY column3 ASC;
SELECT column1, AVG(column3) AS average_column3 FROM machine_learning_dataset GROUP BY column1 HAVING count(*) > 1 ORDER BY average_column3 DESC;
SELECT column1, SUM(column3) AS total_column3 FROM machine_learning_dataset WHERE column1 BETWEEN 50 AND 150 GROUP BY column1 HAVING total_column3 > 500 ORDER BY column1 ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT column2 FROM machine_learning_dataset WHERE column3 < 50 ORDER BY column2 ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_name, age FROM users WHERE age > 25;
SELECT user_name, age, gender FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT user_name, age FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_name, timestamp FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_name, age, gender FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY user_name;
SELECT user_name, age, timestamp FROM users INNER JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING transaction_count > 3;
SELECT user_id, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY max_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT purchase_id, product_id, amount FROM purchases WHERE user_id = 3 AND quantity > 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_purchases > 2;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT users.user_id, transactions.amount, purchases.quantity FROM users INNER JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id INNER JOIN purchases ON users.user_id = purchases.user_id
SELECT username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com'
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE amount < 50 ORDER BY purchase_id ASC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, age FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, gender, created_at FROM users WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount < 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, age, gender FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(order_id) AS num_orders FROM orders GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_orders > 3;

SELECT p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.item_total FROM products p INNER JOIN order_items oi ON p.product_id = oi.product_id WHERE p.category = 'Electronics' AND oi.quantity >= 2 ORDER BY oi.item_total DESC;

SELECT u.username, o.order_date, SUM(oi.item_total) AS total_spent FROM users u INNER JOIN orders o ON u.user_id = o.user_id INNER JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id GROUP BY u.username, o.order_date HAVING total_spent > 500;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, product_id, rating FROM reviews WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC, user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, product_id, quantity FROM orders WHERE user_id = 2;
